:::{.box .bs-right}

# Amending the constitution
:::

:::{.box .bs-bottom }

The National Assembly whenever four fifth shall deem it necessary shall propose amendments to this constitution.

The sitting President's duty shall be to educate his people on the implication of such amendments for six months. His purse to do so shall be adequate.

The people shall vote after six months. If two thirds votes in the yes, the amendments shall pass.

:::
